welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Farmersville! This charming city is known for its rich history and friendly community. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that it has to offer during your stay."

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Visalia Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Visalia Airport is used for the transportation of goods and packages.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Porterville Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Porterville Airport handles all freight and cargo operations.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport and is free for all passengers.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Corcoran Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Corcoran Airport caters to private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
